Delivery of Alcohol or any illegal items is prohibited by law

The terms and conditions for the use of services at SNAPPYY DELIVERIES must be accepted to utilize our application.

 TERMS AND CONDITIONS :- 

 1)	 Snappyy Deliveries primarily use E-mail or message service to Communicate with you. 

 2)	 All buying receipts, confirmation notice And welcome message are delivered through automated communications. 

 3)	 Snappyy Deliveries reserve the to check or scan the goods given To then for any illegal materials and it found report to the concerned authorities. 

 4)	 Goods collected from stores of your choice for deliveries will be At your assurance neither SNAPPYY DELIVERIES or our Delivery partner will be responsible for things like taste, expiry date ,or goods not upto your satisfaction , our job is to deliver. 

 5)	 SNAPPYY DELIVERIES shall not be liable for failure to perform any part of its obligations here is where such failure is due to ;fire , flood , power failure , strikes , industrial disturbances ,war ( declared or undeclared) acts of terror ,commercially unreasonable hostile act by third party with respect to blockages , embargoes , legal restrictions governmental regulations or riots insurrections or any cause beyond the control of SNAPPYY DELIVERIES. 

 6)	 Full access to any service is available when you have made payment for it . 

 7)	 SNPPYY DELIVERIES reserve the right to make additions , deletions , or modifications to the content or the services at any time without prior notice.

 8) 	 There is no cancellations and refund policy. 


	 SNAPPYY DELIVERIES does not allow cancelling the process of payments or refund the paid amount for the service opted ,however if a perticular goods for some reason is not available at store opted can be delivered from elsewhere.
